metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17528 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1.0. There is a SEGV in the function AP4_TfhdAtom::SetDefaultSampleSize at Core/Ap4TfhdAtom.h when called from AP4_Processor::ProcessFragments in Core/Ap4Processor.cpp.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
